title: Today's picks: From Bajaj Finance to Infosys, hot stocks to watch on Friday

article.title: Today's picks: From Bajaj Finance to Infosys, hot stocks to watch on Friday
article.content:
Nifty

Current 10,856 (fut: 10,849), Target: NA

Stop-long positions at 10,775. Stop-short positions at 10,925. Big Moves could go till 10,975, 10,725. A long 10700p(53) , long 11000c (35), short 11100c (15), short 10600p (34) costs net 39 with breakevens at 11661, 11039.

Bank Nifty

Current: 26,643 (fut: 26,651)

Target: NA

Stop-long positions at 26,525. Stop-short positions at 26,775. Big moves could go till 27,050, 26,250. Trend will depend on news-flow out of central bank policy reviews.

Bajaj Finance

Current price: Rs 2,231

Target price: Rs 2,195

Keep a stop at Rs 2,250 and go short. Add to the position between 2200-2210.

Book profits at 2195.

Bharti Airtel

Current price: Rs 376

Target price: Rs 370

Keep a stop at 379 and go short. Add to the position between

371-372. Book profits at 370.

Infosys

Current price: Rs 1,275

Target price: Rs 1,300

Keep a stop at 1265 and go long. Add to the position between 1287-1295. Book profits at 1300.
